snippet: The department is taking control of tons of uranium left over from a company it created in the 1990s, calling the rescue vital to maintaining national security.
abstract: Energy Department is taking control of tons of uranium left over from USEC, a company it created in the 1990s to privatize uranium enrichment; calls the rescue vital to maintaining nuclear weapons and national security.
lead_paragraph: The department is taking control of tons of uranium left over from a company it created in the 1990s, calling the rescue vital to maintaining national security.

headline.seo: Energy Department Steps In to Help Uranium Enrichment Company
headline.main: Energy Department Steps in to Help Uranium Enrichment Company
headline.print_headline: Energy Department Steps In to Help Uranium Enrichment Company
